solution_line_template: Every apple pie has {bite_sizes_per_half} x {halves_per_pie} = <<{bite_sizes_per_half}*{halves_per_pie}={bite_sizes_per_pie}>>{bite_sizes_per_pie} bite sizes
{num_pies} x {bite_sizes_per_pie} = <<{num_pies}*{bite_sizes_per_pie}={total_bite_sizes}>>{total_bite_sizes} people can taste Sedrach's apple pies
